body.name: Hanes Women's High-Waisted Brief Panties, 6-Pack, Moisture-Wicking Cotton Brief Underwear (Colors May Vary)
features: Fabric type Solid: 100% Cotton; Heathers: 75% Cotton, 25% Polyester
QUALITY FABRIC - Hanes women's briefs are made from buttery pre-shrunk cotton that's soft and lightweight.
VALUE YOU EXPECT - Each women's underwear value pack includes 6 pairs of high-waisted underwear for women.
NO-RIDE-UP BRIEF FIT - Designed with a high rise and full-seat coverage, with leg bands that stay in place.
MOISTURE-WICKING DESIGN - Cool Comfort fabric wicks away moisture to keep you cool and dry all day long.
COMFORT YOU DESERVE - Comfort Flex signature waistband prevents pinching and binding.
body.description: When it's time to stock up on the best basic cotton briefs, look to Hanes®. These soft, absorbent high-quality cotton briefs are made with Hanes® Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. These essential high-rise briefs are designed with full seat coverage, no-ride-up leg bands for stay-in-place comfort and a soft waistband that won't pinch or bind. Plus the cotton is preshrunk so the size you buy is the size they stay. And, they're tagless for itch-free comfort. These cotton panties from Hanes® are one of the best briefs you can buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value and comfort.
reviews.reviewText: I’m glad that there is still a company that makes 100% cotton briefs for women that are also reasonably priced. Substantial fabric, good fit, leg openings are modest and comfortable (not a high cut brief). Gimme these old-school knickers every time for real comfort and coverage!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit and feel at a great price.
reviews.reviewText: The same no-frills underwear that I've used for decades. They fit perfectly, they're comfortable, and are at a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've been buying these underwear as needed for years; probably since high school. Same size, same general variety pack, two packs at a time. It's a formula that works for me. I like having a simple, go-to underwear option without having to shop around or think about it.For the most part, these fit exactly as they're supposed to. But I've found that, in every pack, there's one random pair that's smaller than all the others, despite being tagged with all the correct dimensions. This odd pair always fits AROUND the waist correctly; it's the height of the cut that's different, falling about an inch below the rest of the pairs. In the case of this assortment, I've found that the odd pair is the darker pink ones—the ones that, in the photo, are third from the top, and appear to be sort of a greyish mauve. They're not greyish mauve in person. They're definitely a dark pink, more like orchid. (The remaining pairs' colors are all correct as pictured. Black; grey; light pink; caucasian nude; bright white.)I'm not sure why this always happens in every pack (I had an odd pair in my last set, too, almost as if a pair of bikini briefs was mislabeled as regular briefs), but they aren't smaller in an uncomfortable way, just a slightly awkward way, so they still work. They're just not my favorite pairs. But again, all the others fit perfectly, as expected, so the packs are still well worth the money.The only other odd thing I've noticed is that they seem especially thin this time around. The lighter colors are literally almost sheer. You can see skin creases, etc. through them. I don't seem to remember Hanes briefs being that thin before, but because they're so comfortable, convenient, and cost-effective, it's not a dealbreaker. Even if I only get a year, year-and-a-half out of them, they'll still be worth it. That's not bad.These aren't perfect, but they're pretty damn close overall, so I'll take it. I've worn them for years and still recommend them, and whenever these do give out, I plan to keep getting more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable panties--a tad smaller than expected
reviews.reviewText: Panties are high quality and are comfortable. Please be aware that I ordered a size 7, my normal size, and they run small. Next time I will order a size up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These fit well and were soft to the skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good Fit and Styling-But Not Undies you'll have for years!
reviews.reviewText: Colors and style are very nice, as well as material to help them feel more comfortable. Although priced far less than other good brands, these didn't hold up that well after 5 normal washing cycles in our LG washer and dryer. They're good and fine but if you're looking for panties to fall in love with and not having to replace every couple months, look elsewhere.I hope this is honest and helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It has been diffIcult for me to find underwear that is comfortable and long lasting, and that isn’t made out of incredibly thin material. I don’t want colors, or low cuts. Years ago Penny’s used to make plain white underwear that lasted for a decade or more. This brand is the closest I have found to those old Penny’s classics. They are soft and very comfortable and they appear to be well made. I am very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These ran very small
reviews.reviewText: Good quality beautiful but they run very small
Fueron un regalo para mi hija, le encantó todo, ajuste, tela y diseño. Me dice que son muy cómodos, somos de una zona de mucho calor y no provocan sudor excesivo.

I’m in Canada atm. If you order size 9 in Canada you get the colors in the photo (ordered twice, both are these colors). The colors are nicer than they look in the package pictures (see waistband picture). The waistband picture shows the actual color, stitching and elastic in the dark blue pair so you can judge for yourself if they are for you. Reviews seemed mixed here but since they had a lot of good stars, i bought some to try. They were fine, fit great, comfy and I used them for nearly two months before buying a second set. I don’t care about colors really but i prefer that some are dark and few if any are all white, so these were a bonus. I saw some reviews saying quality has dropped but these sets are the only ones of these I’ve had so I can’t comment on that. After about two months of wash and wear you can see in the waistband picture that my first set still look new. They seem like they’ll hold up, we shall see. So far so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 14, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Have bought these before in the States and loved them- delighted to be able to buy them again in the UK.They last for ages!
Se ven de buena calidad pero estan un poco mas grandes.
